name: Beat! This Game
description:
Beat! This Game is rhythm game composed by different stages, in which there is a boss battle. Unlike many other titles of this genre, the player won’t see notes on the screen to play. The patterns to play will be composed by the attacks of the enemy you are facing (in this game “play a note” is “avoid an attack”) and by the attacks of the player. The battles will take place in the dreams of the main character, a girl named C., and the bosses will be the incarnation of her fears, frustrations which she will have to defeat using her biggest love: music.

Beat! This Game is a video game developed for the Videogame Design and Programming course, Dipartimento di Elettronica, Informazione e Bioingegneria, Politecnico di Milano
